channel.title: NPCS attacking with MAGE but deformed ATTACK EVEN when u put EMOTE in. HELP!
channel.description:
right i have my npc attacking with mage kalphite queen 2 forms but they booth attack deformed cause they attack with mage.. look the pictures lol
[IMG]http://i218.photobucket.com/albums/cc38/joshowen1/kq1-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i218.photobucket.com/albums/cc38/joshowen1/kq2-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i218.photobucket.com/albums/cc38/joshowen1/2007-10-21_225425.png[/img]
IF YOU NO A FIX FOR THIS I WILL GIVE YOU REP++ PLEASE I NEED IT BAD LOL.. IF YOU NO HOW TO FIX PLEASE POST HERE AS FAST AS YOU CAN !!

item.title: NPCS attacking with MAGE but deformed ATTACK EVEN when u put EMOTE in. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @joshscape123 joshscape123
item.description:
@joshscape123 wrote:

it looks like this

                                           npcs[NPCID].animNumber = ANIMHERE; // mage attack
                                           if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1160) {
                                           p.stillgfx(GFXNUMBER, p.absY, p.absX);
                                           hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(30);
                                           }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2007, 01:05:06 PM[/size][hr]and it is in emote attack void

Read full topic

item.title: NPCS attacking with MAGE but deformed ATTACK EVEN when u put EMOTE in. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Ian Ian
item.description:
@Ian wrote:

Well Firstof All In The Void npcattack mage youll see a little line with animation = 711; //mage attack

711 = Human Mage Attack Emote, This is being Drawn as being used for all npcs…

remove it and add a line for the emote under the (NPCID == blah Stuff

Tenacious T:

looks to me like you have edited your NPC.JAVA file wrong, try to go into that and check for any mistake you have made?

100% Wrong.
